title: Didn't find any proper info online so asking here
content:
1. Why are there two campuses in pes? 
2. How far are these two campuses?

comments.body:
Two campuses because management is greedy like any other private college and campuses are about ~20 Km apart from each other.

IMO either take CSE in RR campus or just go with any other private college, placements are good but trust me no amount of money will bring back that lost college experience.

I get this, but I believe they didn't have enough available space to extend the campus so they built another campus further away? 

Oh no no, I am not taking admission in pes, just that I was going through colleges in KA and came across pes and it's two campuses so was curious

The PESU EC campus was already there even before it was announced as a University, which was in 2018. Till then it was called PESIT and admission was only through CET or COMEDK. 
2018 onwards, EC campus has PESSAT and the same curriculum and placements as RR campus.

What's there to be curious about 2 college?
BMS has 2 college
Rv has 2 college
Msr has 2 college
Dayanad has 3? Not sure
These are just a few of the names , 
Atleast unlike the ones I mentioned pes atleast has a joint placement for both the campus
